question: Does this app collect any personal data?
answer: No, we do not collect, store, or share any personal information. The app works entirely offline except for fetching quotes from public APIs.

question: Where is my preference data stored?
answer: All settings and preferences are stored locally on your device and are deleted when you uninstall the app.

question: How often are new quotes added?
answer: Quotes update automatically every 24 hours from our API sources. You can manually refresh at any time.

question: Where do the quotes come from?
answer: Quotes are sourced from these public APIs: [FavQs](https://favqs.com), [Breaking Bad Quotes](https://github.com/shevabam/breaking-bad-quotes), and other community-maintained repositories.

question: Is my sharing activity tracked?
answer: No, we do not monitor or log any sharing activities. The app uses your device's native share functionality.

question: Is this app GDPR/COPPA compliant?
answer: Yes, we fully comply with GDPR (EU) and COPPA (US) regulations. No user data is collected from any age group.

question: How are updates handled?
answer: App updates are optional and only contain feature improvements. No changes to data practices without prior notification.

question: How can I request quote removal?
answer: Email requests to [information.seeker14@gmail.com](mailto:information.seeker14@gmail.com) with 'Quote Removal' in the subject line.
